lines.text: I'll tell you something, my Tenchi. You know, the carnival comes and goes... if you wait for a while, it'll always come back to you, Tenchi.
I guess you're right, Ryoko... I guess you're right.
I'm telling you, Kiyone, you should learn to relax.
And you should learn to panic!
Coming up next is "No Need For Swimsuits." Ooh boy. Well, they can do whatever they want.
Mihoshi, my partner, it's already been a month since you died. You were always such a burden to me, and now, I may never see you again. And that knowledge... makes me so HAPPY!
You shouldn't frown so much Ayeka or those wrinkles will never disappear.
Uh, honorable, hon-hon-honorable sir, can I honorably, uh, honor, in the honor...

[Japanese version. Tenchi is being pulled by Ayeka and Ryoko]
Ay-yi.

[Pulling Tenchi]
What did you just say?
Now calm down Ayeka with a dark past.
